item.title: A Tanker Truck Loaded With Diesel Fuel Overturned!
item.description: A high-risk recovery unfolds as the team responds to an overturned tanker full of diesel fuel, handling the operation with precision and extreme caution.

media:content.media:title: A Tanker Truck Loaded With Diesel Fuel Overturned!
media:content.media:description: A high-risk recovery unfolds as the team responds to an overturned tanker full of diesel fuel, handling the operation with precision and extreme caution.

item.title: Overturned Tanker With Hazardous Materials!
item.description: The crew tackles a dangerous recovery after a tanker overturns with hazardous materials on board, working carefully to contain the risk and clear the scene safely.

item.title: Late-Night Tow Turns Into a Wild Catch!
item.description: What starts as a simple nighttime tow quickly takes an unexpected turn, the crew ends up with a recovery they definitely didn’t see coming.

item.title: Pulling a Pickup from the Ditch
item.description: A stranded pickup needs rescuing after sliding into a ditch, watch the crew use skill and precision to get it back on the road safely.

item.title: Semi Rolls into Woods!
item.description: The team responds to a major recovery after a semi leaves the road and crashes into the woods, working carefully to bring the rig back to safety.

item.title: Thick fog, tough recovery
item.description: In heavy fog and low visibility, the crew faces a difficult recovery operation and manages to pull out something you’ll have to see to believe.

item.title: Recovering a Heavily Damaged Truck and Trailer
item.description: Watch as the crew takes on the tough job of recovering a wrecked truck and trailer, a challenging rescue that puts their heavy-duty skills to the test.

item.title: Another Mississippi River Mishap
item.description: Recovery teams respond to a new incident near the Mississippi River, working methodically to secure equipment and restore safe conditions.

item.title: Heavy-Duty Recovery on Unstable Ground!
item.description: A challenging recovery unfolds on uneven terrain as the crew works carefully to stabilize the site and bring heavy equipment to safety.

item.title: Harley Glider Turned Bobber
item.description: A classic Harley Glider gets a fresh new look. Watch the transformation as it’s rebuilt into a clean, custom bobber style.

item.title: Heavy Haul GONE WRONG!
item.description: A tough hauling job doesn’t go as planned. See how the crew manages the situation and works to bring everything safely under control.

item.title: A Flatbed Flips With a 48,000 LB Coil on Board!
item.description: A major recovery operation unfolds as the team works to upright a flatbed carrying a massive 48,000-pound coil.

item.title: A Car Stuck in the Ditch
item.description: A simple slip turns into a recovery mission — see how the crew gets this car back on the road quickly and safely.

item.title: Truck Trapped in a Ditch
item.description: When a heavy truck slides off the road, recovery gets challenging. Watch how it’s safely pulled back onto solid ground.

item.title: Handling a Severe Head-On Impact
item.description: A serious collision calls for precision and teamwork — see how the crew manages a tough recovery after a head-on impact.

item.title: Heavy Lifting with the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers
item.description: Big machines, big tasks — just another day for the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers as they take on some serious heavy lifting with ease.

item.title: Firefighters and Towing Experts Unite!
item.description: Teamwork in action! See how firefighters and towing professionals join forces to handle a challenging recovery with skill and precision.

item.title: Nissan 350Z Pulled From the Creek!
item.description: A tough recovery mission! See how we haul a Nissan 350Z out of the creek and back onto solid ground.

item.title: Caught in a bind? We've got the unwind. ��
item.description: When things get stuck, we get rolling! Watch how a tricky recovery turns into a smooth save with skill and horsepower.

item.title: Code 3 Call: Fiery Pickup Truck on Interstate!
item.description: Code 3 Call: Fiery Pickup Truck on Interstate! #reel #interstate #pickup #tow #fblifestyle
